resources.string: Check your knowledge of android development by answering the 5 questions below.
1. What syntax is used in order to call a method on a java object?
2. Which of the following is a correct example when casting an Object? \nPlease select all that apply
3. What is the default text that is displayed on the screen when setting up a new AndroidStudio project?
Type answer and then tap to evaluate

4. What would be the best name of a concept describing high-achieving individuals who are marked by an inability to internalize their accomplishments and a persistent fear of being exposed as a "fraud"?
5. What data type should be declared for a variable that can store only two possible values (such as true or false)?
Sorry! Your answer is incorrect. Try again!
You are on the right track, but this question has more than one correct answer
